QuestData.Title: Ruag's Report
QuestData.Description: Here is Ruag's report, $n. Let him know his scout is still here.$B$BDo not speak of Helgrum. I will not distract others with news of tragedy.$B$BI have to be strong. We all have to be strong.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Splinterspear Report to Dispatch Commander Ruag in Stonard.
QuestData.RewardText: <Ruag reads over the report.>$b$bI see. Thank you for this information, $n.
